name: MobileHook
description:
You are a robot, at the bottom of a scrapyard pit. 

You are unable to walk ! Only your grappling hook and your agility can save you from the big Crusher: the deadly destroyer of obsolete machines. Collect coins to unlock new powers temporarly !

It's a one-button game : touch where you want to throw the grappling hook and where you want to jump.

Enjoy !
